thread.title: Paragon Casino Resort Names Nancy Herrington Vice President of Marketing
thread.title_full: Paragon Casino Resort Names Nancy Herrington Vice President of Marketing - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Paragon Casino Resort Names Nancy Herrington Vice President of Marketing
text:
Paragon Casino Resort
-Successful executive returns to Marksville -
MARKSVILLE, La. , Aug. 31, Paragon Casino Resort has appointed Nancy Herrington Vice President of Marketing.
Herrington comes to Paragon after four years as Director of Marketing at Cypress Bayou Casino Hotel in Charenton, Louisiana . Prior to her tenure at Cypress Bayou, Herrington held a variety of marketing positions at Paragon, including nearly eight years as Director of Marketing Programs.
"I'm extremely happy to be back home at Paragon," said Herrington. "It's an exciting time in the history of the resort. We're introducing some wonderful new amenities, and we have strategies in place to make the experience an even better one for our guests in the coming years."
"With her previous leadership positions in marketing, Nancy brings the perfect blend of experience to this role," said Chris Barbry , Acting General Manager at Paragon.
About Paragon Casino Resort
Paragon Casino Resort, in Marksville, Louisiana features a world-class casino with Las Vegas-style slots and table games. There are more than 500 rooms and suites, cabins and an RV park. Guests can enjoy a soaring atrium with a "living" bayou and live alligators, a full-service spa, shopping, an arcade, Kids Quest, a three-screen cinema, an indoor tropical pool with swim-up bar, fabulous dining choices, a championship golf course and the best in live entertainment.
Paragon Casino Resort is owned and operated by the Tunica-Biloxi Tribe of Louisiana . The Tunica-Biloxi Tribe and Paragon Casino Resort are committed to economic development in Central Louisiana and enhancing the lives of its citizens by partnering with businesses, civic organizations, and nonprofit organizations for the betterment of all. Paragon Casino Resort currently employs more than 1,200 associates and continues to have a growing and positive effect in Central Louisiana .
For more information, visit ParagonCasinoResort.com . Follow Paragon on Facebook , Twitter , Pinterest and YouTube .
